title: Explain women in econ and politics 1914-39

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized. Analyze the participation of European women in the economy and in politics from 1914 to 1939. Use examples from at least TWO countries.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
